trans-unit.source: Represents a Boolean field that is displayed as a check box in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et boolsk felt som vises som en avmerkingsboks i en databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxField class is used by data-bound controls (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) to display the value of a Boolean data field in a check box.
trans-unit.target: Klassen CheckBoxField brukes av databundet kontroller (eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>) til å vise verdien av et boolsk datafelt i en avmerkingsboks.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The CheckBoxField object is displayed differently depending on the data-bound control in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: Objektet CheckBoxField vises forskjellig avhengig databundet kontrollen den brukes.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a CheckBoxField object as a column, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays it as a row.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen viser en CheckBoxField-objektet som en kolonne, mens den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen viser som en rad.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A check box is disabled (read-only) until the data-bound control displays a record that contains the check box in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En avmerkingsboks er deaktivert (skrivebeskyttet) til databindingselementer kontrollen viser en post som inneholder avmerkingsboks i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to put a record into edit mode, see the documentation for the parent control that contains the CheckBoxField object.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du legger en oppføring i redigeringsmodus, kan du se dokumentasjonen for den overordnede kontrollen som inneholder CheckBoxField-objektet.

trans-unit.source: To specify the field to display in a CheckBoxField object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> property with the field's name.
trans-unit.target: Angi felt skal vises i et CheckBoxField-objekt, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A>egenskap med feltnavnet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because a check box can display only a selected or an unselected state, a CheckBoxField object can be bound only to a field with a Boolean data type or a string that can be parsed by <xref:System.Boolean.Parse%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi en avmerkingsboks kan vise bare et valgt eller en valgt tilstand, et CheckBoxField-objekt kan bare bindes til et felt med en boolsk datatype eller en streng som kan bli analysert av <xref:System.Boolean.Parse%2A>.</xref:System.Boolean.Parse%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can display a caption next to each check box by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise en tekst ved siden av hver avmerkingsboks ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField.Text%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: A CheckBoxField object is hidden in a data-bound control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: En CheckBoxField-objektet er skjult i en databundet kontrollere når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the value of a field from being modified in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: For å hindre at verdien for et felt som endres i redigeringsmodus, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: In data-bound controls that support inserting records (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control), you can hide a CheckBoxField object in insert mode by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer som støtter poster i databindingselementer (som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>kontrollen), kan du skjule et CheckBoxField objekt i insert-modus ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InsertVisible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: You can customize the header and footer sections of a CheckBoxField object.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse topp- og bunntekst delene av et CheckBoxField-objekt.

trans-unit.source: To display a caption in the header or footer sections, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: For å vise en tekst i toppteksten eller bunnteksten deler, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of displaying text in the header section, you can display an image by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan vise et bilde i stedet for å vise tekst i toppteksten, ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The header section can be hidden in the CheckBoxField object by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Toppteksten kan skjules i CheckBoxField-objektet ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some data-bound controls (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) can show or hide only the entire header section of the control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Noen databundet kontroller (slik som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen) kan vise eller skjule bare delen hele topp kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: These data-bound controls do not support the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A> property for an individual bound field.
trans-unit.target: Disse databundet kontroller støtter ikke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>egenskapen for et enkelt bundne.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To show or hide the entire header section of a data-bound control (if available), use the control's `ShowHeader` property.
trans-unit.target: Vis eller Skjul delen hele overskrift for en databundet kontroll (hvis tilgjengelig), bruker kontrollens `ShowHeader` egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: You also can customize the appearance of the CheckBoxField object (font color, background color, and so on) by setting the style properties for the different parts of the field.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også tilpasse utseendet til CheckBoxField objektet (skriftfarge bakgrunnsfarge og så videre) ved å angi stilegenskaper for de ulike delene av feltet.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different style properties.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene annen stil.

trans-unit.source: |Style property|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>|The style settings for the child Web server controls of the CheckBoxField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>|The style settings for the footer section of the CheckBoxField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>|The style settings for the header section of the CheckBoxField object.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>|The style settings for the data items in the CheckBoxField object.|
trans-unit.target: | Style-egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for de underordnede server webkontroller for CheckBoxField-objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for bunnteksten for CheckBoxField-objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for delen topptekst for CheckBoxField-objektet. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>| Stilinnstillingene for dataelementer i objektet CheckBoxField. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when adding fields to a dynamically created data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren brukes vanligvis når du legger til felt til en dynamisk opprettet databundet-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: To dynamically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object to a data-bound control, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object, set its properties, and then add it to the data-bound control's field collection.
trans-unit.target: Dynamisk legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objekt til en databundet kontroll, Opprett en ny <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objekt, angi egenskapene og deretter legge den til databindingselementer kontrollens feltet samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker for eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>styre, legge til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objekt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can dynamically add fields to a data-bound control, it is strongly recommended that all fields be statically declared and then shown or hidden, as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om dynamisk kan du legge til felt i en databundet, det anbefales at alle felt statisk deklarert og deretter vises eller skjules, etter behov.

trans-unit.source: Statically declaring all your fields reduces the size of the view state for the parent data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: Statisk deklarerer alle felt reduserer størrelsen på visningsstatusen for den overordnede databundet kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ApplyFormatInEditMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyFormatInEditMode property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class, but is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ApplyFormatInEditMode er arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>class, men gjelder ikke for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to access the value of this property will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName> exception.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å få tilgang til denne egenskapen vil throw en <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported, and throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke, og det oppstår en <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read or set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte er å lese eller angi verdien for denne egenskapen oppgitt.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The ConvertEmptyStringToNull property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class, but is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ConvertEmptyStringToNull er arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>class, men gjelder ikke for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to access the value of this property will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName> exception.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å få tilgang til denne egenskapen vil throw en <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported and throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke og oppstår en <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read or set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte er å lese eller angi verdien for denne egenskapen oppgitt.

trans-unit.source: Copies the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Overfører egenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> objektet til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CopyProperties method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to copy the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object created by the CopyProperties method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CopyProperties er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objekt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>objektet er opprettet av metoden CopyProperties.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> to copy the properties of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> å kopiere egenskaper for gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> til.

trans-unit.source: Creates an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et tomt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The CreateField method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object to which the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object can be copied.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateField er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å opprette en tom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objektet som egenskaper for gjeldende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objekt kan kopieres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.CloneField%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the data field to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på datafeltet skal bindes til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataField property to specify the name of the data field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataField-egenskapen til å angi navnet på datafeltet skal bindes til det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: The name of the data field to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på datafeltet skal bindes til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir strengen som angir visningsformatet for verdien i feltet.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The DataFormatString property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class, but is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DataFormatString er arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>class, men gjelder ikke for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to access the value of this property will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName> exception.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å få tilgang til denne egenskapen vil throw en <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format for the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: En formatering tekststreng som angir visningsformatet for verdien i feltet.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported, and throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke, og det oppstår en <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read or set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte er å lese eller angi verdien for denne egenskapen oppgitt.

trans-unit.source: Fills the specified <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> object with the values from the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fyller den angitte <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> objektet med verdiene fra den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The ExtractValuesFromCell method is provided as a convenient way to retrieve the values of the fields from the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ExtractValuesFromCell er angitt som en enkel måte å hente verdier for feltene fra den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objekt i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: This method does not have a return value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden har ikke en returverdi.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the field values are returned by reference through the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> object passed in for the `dictionary` parameter.
trans-unit.target: I stedet feltverdiene returneres av referansen via den <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>objekt sendt for den `dictionary` parameteren.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After the method has been called, iterate through the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> object to access the field values.
trans-unit.target: Etter at den har blitt kalt, gå gjennom den <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>objekt for å få tilgang til feltverdiene.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object contains read-only field values, you must pass in `true` for the `includeReadOnly` parameter to include those values.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>objektet inneholder skrivebeskyttede feltverdier, må du sende i `true` for den `includeReadOnly` parameteren inkludere verdiene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> used to store the values of the specified cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary?displayProperty=fullName> brukes til å lagre verdiene i den angitte cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> that contains the values to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> som inneholder verdiene du vil hente.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include the values of read-only fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å ta med verdier skrivebeskyttet feltene. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the value used for the field's value when rendering the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien brukt for feltverdien ved gjengivelse av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> objekt i en designer.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeValue method is a helper method used to determine what value to display for a field when rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object in a designer.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetDesignTimeValue er en helper brukes til å bestemme hva verdien skal vises for et felt ved gjengivelse av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objekt i en designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: If real data can not be retrieved from the data source at design time, the value returned by this method is displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke kan hente reelle data fra datakilden på utformingstidspunktet, vises verdien som returneres av denne metoden i stedet.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.HtmlEncode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The HtmlEncode property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class, but is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HtmlEncode er arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>class, men gjelder ikke for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to access the value of this property will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName> exception.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å få tilgang til denne egenskapen vil throw en <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported and throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke og oppstår en <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read or set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte er å lese eller angi verdien for denne egenskapen oppgitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the formatted text should be HTML encoded before it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om formatert tekst skal være HTML-kodede før den vises.

trans-unit.source: HTML-encoding values can help prevent cross-site scripting attacks and malicious content from being displayed.
trans-unit.target: HTML-koding verdier kan hjelpe deg med å hindre at tvers skripting angrep og skadelig innhold vises.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text should be HTML encoded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det skal stå HTML-kodede; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> object to the specified row state.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer angitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> objektet til den angitte rad-tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeDataCell method is a helper method used to initialize a cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeDataCell er en helper brukes til å initialisere en celle i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"></xref> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell"> </xref> ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for a field when the field's value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises for et felt når feltverdien <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The NullDisplayText property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class, but is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen NullDisplayText er arvet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>class, men gjelder ikke for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to access the value of this property will throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName> exception.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å få tilgang til denne egenskapen vil throw en <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed for a field with a value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som vises for et felt med verdien <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported, and throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen støttes ikke, og det oppstår en <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to read or set the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte er å lese eller angi verdien for denne egenskapen oppgitt.

trans-unit.source: Binds the value of a field to a check box in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for et felt er bundet til en avmerkingsboks i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataBindField method is a helper method used to bind the value of a field in the data source to a corresponding check box in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataBindField til er helper metode som brukes til å binde verdien av feltet i datakilden til en tilsvarende avmerkingsboks i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the control supports HTML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Henter en boolsk verdi som angir om kontrollen støtter HTML-koding.

trans-unit.source: HTML encoding is not supported for this control, and this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: HTML-koding støttes ikke for denne kontrollen, og denne egenskapen returnerer alltid `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the caption to display next to each check box in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal vises ved siden av hver avmerkingsboks i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The Text property is used to display a caption next to each check box in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object.
trans-unit.target: Text-egenskapen til å vise en tekst ved siden av hver avmerkingsboks i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: If the Text property is set to an empty string, no caption is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Text-egenskapen er satt til en tom streng, vises ingen tittelen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > All check boxes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object share the same caption.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alle avmerkingsboksene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objektet deler samme teksten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The caption displayed next to each check box in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Teksten vises ved siden av hver avmerkingsboks i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the controls contained in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"></xref> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om kontrollene finnes i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField"> </xref> objekt støtte tilbakeringinger.

trans-unit.source: The ValidateSupportsCallback method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField> object support callbacks.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ValidateSupportsCallback er en helper brukes til å bestemme om kontrollene finnes i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>objekt støtte tilbakeringinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxField>

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented as an empty method (a method that does not contain any code) to indicate that callbacks are supported.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er implementert som en tom metode (en metode som ikke inneholder kode) til å angi at tilbakeringinger støttes.
